text: Je loka asa asiksita (jagatila gurujanandvare siksana na ghetalelya) paigambarace anusarana karatata, je tya lokanna apalya javalacya taurata ani injilamadhye lihilele adhalatata. Te tyanna nekicya kamanca adesa detata ani duskarmampasuna rokhatata ani paka (svaccha-sud'dha) vastu halala (vaidha) asalyace sangatata ani napaka (asvaccha-asud'dha) vastu harama (avaidha) asalyace sangatata ani tya lokanvara je ojhe ani galyace phasa hote, tyanna dura karatata. Yastava je loka ya (nabi) vara imana rakhatata, ani tyance samarthana karatata ani tyanna madata karatata, ani tya nura (prakasa) ce anusarana karatata, jo tyancyasobata pathavila gela ahe, ase loka purna saphalata prapta karanare aheta
